title: Beetle armor
summaries: Beetle armor is a Hardmode, post-Golem armor set that provides melee and defensive bonuses. It is the final melee armor set available on the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, it is the penultimate melee only armor set followed by Solar Flare armor.

Beetle armor has two variants for its chest piece; Beetle Scale Mail and Beetle Shell. The Beetle Scale Mail enhances damage output, is slightly more agile, and can grant the Beetle Might buff, whereas the Beetle Shell provides more defense and can grant the Beetle Endurance buff.

Crafting the full set with one chest piece requires 18 Beetle Husks and a full set of Turtle armor (54 Chlorophyte Bars (or 324 pieces of Chlorophyte Ore), and 3 Turtle Shells). Crafting all four pieces from scratch requires 26 Beetle Husks, 78 Chlorophyte Bars (or 468 pieces of Chlorophyte Ore), and 4 Turtle Shells.
